chinese: vt.证明••••正确或有理
english: justify

chinese: 他正试图为自己粗鲁的行为辩解。
english: He is trying to justify his rude behavior

chinese: v.整理，布置；改编（乐曲）；筹备，安排；达成协议；做安排
english: arrange

chinese: 是时候把衣柜里的这堆衣服整理一下了。
english: It's time to arrange the pile of clothes in the wardrobe

chinese: ad）.迷人的，有极大吸引力的
english: fascinating

chinese: 墙上的这幅3D绘画真吸引人啊！
english: This 3D painting on the wall is really fascinating

chinese: v.提取；取出；摘录；设法得到；索取 2摘录；提出物
english: extract

chinese: 钻探设备从海底提取石油。
english: The rig extracts oil from the ocean floor

chinese: n.女性同性恋者
english: lesbian

chinese: 这两位女同性恋者幸福地生活在一起。
english: The two lesbians live happily together

chinese: n. 牛仔
english: cowboy

chinese: 这三个骑马的男人是牛仔。
english: The three men riding on their horses are cowboys

chinese: n. 机械装置
english: mechanism

chinese: 手表内部的机械装置是很复杂的。
english: A watch's mechanism is very complicated

chinese: n.亚麻桌布；亚麻布
english: linen

chinese: 这些亚麻桌布摸起来很粗糙。
english: The linen tablecloth is rough to the touch

chinese: cdj.灭绝的；破灭了的，消亡了的
english: extinct

chinese: 地球上的很多动物已经灭绝了。
english: Many animals on Earth have become extinct

chinese: n. 猪肉
english: pork

chinese: 我从超市买了些猪肉。
english: I bought some pork from the supermarket

chinese: n.经度
english: longitude

chinese: 这个地方位于东经40度。
english: This place is at longitude 40 degrees east

chinese: 以.修改；温习（功课）
english: revise

chinese: 她正在根据老师给的意见修改论文。
english: She is revising her paper according to the advice given by her teacher

chinese: 以调解，调停，斡旋
english: mediate

chinese: 我试图调解他们的矛盾，但是他们不听我的。
english: I tried to mediate their argument, but they never listen to me

chinese: v.减少 n.减少
english: decrease

chinese: 这两年我们的销售额都在减少，现在我们没钱
english: Our sales have decreased for the last two years, and now we're out of money

chinese: 1.支配
english: dominance

chinese: 地任公司中处于支配地位，因为他有这家公司百分之 十的股份。
english: He has complete dominance in company matters, because he holds a 90% share

chinese: n.指导，引导
english: guidance

chinese: 有了指南针的指引，你会找到回家的路的。
english: Under the guidance of a compass, you will find your way home
